poemsDataJson.list_full: わびぬれば 今(いま)はた同(おな)じ 難波(なには)なる みをつくしても 逢(あ)はむとぞ思(おも)ふ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: In this dire distress//My life is meaningless.//So we must meet now,//Even though it costs my life//In the Bay of Naniwa.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Wabi nureba|Ima hata onaji|Naniwa naru|Mi o tsukushi te mo|Awan to zo omou
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: みをつくしても あはむとそおもふ
poemsDataJson.author: 元良親王(もとよししんのう)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 身を滅ぼしてでも会いたいという激しい恋心
